content.raw:
I was able to run the demo without issue.  I was able to verify that the  

I did verify that `/vrx/scan_dock/placard_symbol` publication was consistent with the `scan_and_dock_b.world.xacro`.   

I did not verify that if we docked the bays that the scores were correctly calculated.
